resources.string:
You can use the following features using variables or constants:
 Feature 			Syntax 		Examples
 Numbers 			1 					42.5
 Variables 			x 					varname
 x powerof y 		x^y 				3^2 = 9
 Squareroot 		sqrt(x) 		sqrt(9) = 3
 Multiply 			x*y 				3*2 = 6
 Divide 				x/y 				3/2 = 1.5
 Add 					x + y 			3+2 = 5
 Subtract 			x - y 			3-2 = 1
 Negate 				-x 				-3 = 0-3
 Absolutevalue 				 	abs(-2) = 2
 Arc-cosine 		acos(x) 		acos(1) = 0
 Arc-sine 			asin(x) 		asin(1) = pi/2
 Arc-tangent 	atan(x) 		atan(1) = pi/4
 						atan2(x, y) 	atan2(-1, -1)
 Natural logarithm 				log(x) 
 Cosine 				cos(x) 		cos(0) = 1
 Sine 					sin(x) 			sin(pi/2) = 1
 Tangent 			tan(x) 		tan(pi/4) = 1 aprox
 e powerof x 		exp(x) 		exp(1) = 2.7182..
 Floor 				floor(x) 			floor(3.5) = 3
 												floor(-3.5) = -4
 Ceiling 				ceil(x) 		ceil(3.5) = 4

Conditionals
 Maximum		 max(x, y)
 Minimum		 min(x, y)
 Rounding		 round(x)		round(3.5) = 4
 		round(-3.5) = -4
